rowElements.elementHeader: Is there a written Safety & Health Policy?
Is there a Safety Organisation with proper delegation of responsibility and accountability for safety and health?
Is there a written safety commitment and is it submitted?
Are regular tool-box meetings conducted and reports submitted?
Are relevant safety training courses provided for management / Supervisors?
Are relevant safety training courses provided for workers?
Are relevant safety training certificates submitted?

sections.sectionName: Safety & Health Rules & Safe Work Procedures/ Risk Assessment
sections.sectionText: Safety & Health Rules & Safe Work Procedures/ Risk Assessment

rowElements.elementHeader: Are there written safety & health rules for the workers?
Are there written safe work procedures/ risk assessment formulated and submitted?
Is there a written programme outlining inspection guidelines, frequency and follow-up corrective actions?
Is there available Personal Protective Equipment and of proper working condition and comply to safety requirements?
Is there a Safety Supervisor working at least 5 hrs / week?
Is there a qualified First Aider?
Are there relevant Licensed Electrical Workers, qualified engineers, qualified supervisors, lifting supervisors, qualified JCB Tower / Mobile / Crawler Crane operators?
